Disturbance of this regulatory process alters the activity of many genes, which likely explains the diverse signs and symptoms of Nicolaides-Baraitser syndrome.",GHR,Nicolaides-Baraitser syndrome
Is Nicolaides-Baraitser syndrome inherited ?,"Nicolaides-Baraitser syndrome follows an autosomal dominant pattern
